mapper.insert: INSERT INTO asset_nexus.nft_head(id, title, file_url, tag, price,issue_flag) select #{request.id,jdbcType=BIGINT} as id, #{request.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as title, #{request.fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as file_url, #{request.tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as tag, #{request.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as price, 0 as issue_flag from dual
mapper.update: update nft_head set issue_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id,title,tag,file_url ,price from nft_head where issue_flag = 1
and title like concat(#{request.title},'%')
and tag like concat(#{request.tag},'%')
and price >= #{request.minPrice} and price <= #{request.maxPrice}

select head.id,head.title,head.tag,head.file_url,head.price, item.author,item.desc,item.contract_address,item.authorized,item.to_address from nft_head head left join nft_item item on head.id = item.head_id
head.id = #{id}
